action.msg: So, you took a bite out of him??
I don't see why not. He's a melon.
And the little shit kept talking. I was getting annoyed.
That's not a fucking good excuse-
DID YOU SERIOUSLY TAKE A BITE OUT OF MY FUCKING HEAD?
I'M MISSING PART OF MY HEAD.
Oh, my bad. I was super hungry.
SO YOU TOOK A BITE OUT OF MY HEAD.
Uhh!- I can do it on the other side so it matches...
I SHOULD HAVE KNOWN THINGS WOULD END UP THIS WAY.
CURSE YOU, CURSE YOU AND THE FILTH THAT BROUGHT YOU INTO THIS WORLD.
Yeah, you see what you've done now??
Oh no, I just thought that line was raw as fuck.
Let me pick something FAST FOR THIS I GUESS.
